plist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: 'NS Forecastie' uses your GPS location to display your weather

gps_not_enabled: please enable GPS to allow NS Forecastie to determine your location
gps_not_authorized: please enable GPS and authorize NS Forecastie to use it to determine your location
name: name
send_bug_report_desc: enter a mail and a description for the encountered error
api_key_required_description: to get weather data from Dark Sky a free API key is required. To remain under the free plan each user should create its own API key. You can do that by creating an account on their website
